form.description: Visual and environmental aspects of the location.

function.description: Main use, role, or purpose of the location within the world.

founding_date.description: Date on which the location was founded, established, or designated.

parent_location.description: Wider location that this location is part of.

populations.description: Distinct groups or communities residing within the location.

political_climate.description: The location's political structure, stability, and dynamics.

primary_power.description: Main institution established for governance or political control.

governing_title.description: Title of the governing figure assigned by the location's primary power.

secondary_powers.description: Significant institutions established for governance or political control.

zone.description: Zone of control of interest that is associated with the location.

rival.description: Location that this one has active, traditional, or historical rivalries with.

partner.description: Location that this one shares active, cooperative, or historical ties with.

extraction_methods.description: Techniques or strategies used to gather natural resources at the location.

extraction_goods.description: Products and materials that are gathered or obtained at the location.

industry_methods.description: Techniques or workflows used to refine or manufacture goods at the location.

industry_goods.description: Products and materials that are refined or manufactured at the location.

infrastructure.description: Roads, ports, and other physical systems that enable the movement of goods and people.

extraction_markets.description: Locations that receive extracted goods through trade, interchange, or seizure.

industry_markets.description: Locations that receive industrial goods through trade, interchange, or seizure.

currencies.description: Currencies or other trade media recognized or circulated at the location.

architecture.description: Styles, forms, or materials used in the location's built environment.

building_methods.description: Techniques or systems used to construct structures at the location.

customs.description: Cultural practices, habits, or traditional behaviors established around the location.

founders.description: Individual(s) who founded or named the location.

cults.description: Significant religious constructs associated with the location.

delicacies.description: Organisms or ingredients locally consumed or celebrated as specialty foods.

defensibility.description: Overall natural and constructed defensive qualities.

elevation.description: Height or elevation of the location relative to surrounding terrain, defined in world DISTANCE units.

fighters.description: Military units or forces responsible for defending the location.

defensive_objects.description: Items or installations for defending the location.
